data.title: Appliance Repair Services & Home Service Plans
data.text:
​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Services from Home Service Plus

Trusted by Minnesota homeowners for more than 80 years, we’re the state’s largest service provider for major appliance repair, maintenance and replacement.

Minnesota's Appliance Repair Service

Benefit from Minnesota’s largest staff of experienced technicians with Home Service Plus. We’ve been trusted professionals in heating, cooling and major appliances for more eight decades, servicing virtually all makes and models. Most of our customers come via referrals from friends, family and neighbors impressed by our skilled, knowledgeable and honest service.

Use online scheduling or set up at appointment by phone, 24/7, at 877-477-1664.

Appliance Repair Services​

When furnaces, air conditioners, water heaters and other major appliances break down, you can trust Home Service Plus to give you an affordable and convenient repair.

Enroll in one of our repair plans, so a breakdown won’t cause you to worry about how you’ll pay an unexpected repair bill.

Heating & Cooling Maintenance Services​

Why is appliance maintenance important?

Helps avoid breakdowns

Keeps appliances energy efficient

Helps extend the lifespan of heating and cooling equipment

Our appliance maintenance services also help avoid potentially dangerous situations, such as a furnace breaking down during extremely cold weather. We can help ensure your equipment operates as the manufacturer intends, and help keep it running longer with regular maintenance.

Time to Replace Your Appliance?

Think it might be time to replace your furnace, air conditioner or water heater? Home Service Plus offers free in-home consultations and the best warranties, as we partner with only the most dependable manufacturers and install the equipment with great care.

We answer calls 24/7, 365 days a year.

CenterPoint Energy's Home Service Plus repair and maintenance services are available to homeowners throughout the Minneapolis and St. Paul Twin Cities Metro Area and in many parts of Greater Minnesota*. Over 300 highly trained and pre-screened technicians, who are knowledgeable on virtually all makes and m​odels, are at your service to repair and maintain your appliances. Whether you are enrolled in one of our repair plans, or just want individual repair and maintenance services, HSP is a name you can trust.

To schedule service, access our online scheduling tool, or call 612-333-1664 in the metro area; toll-free 877-477-1664. in Greater Minnesota.
